title: High boots/zh-CN
data:
**NetHack 中文 Wiki 需要您的帮助！**  
[了解如何帮助我们完善Wiki](/wiki/NetHackWiki:How_to_help/zh-CN "NetHackWiki:How to help/zh-CN")

**[English](/wiki/High_boots "High boots")** • [中文（中国大陆）‎]()

| \[   高筒靴   [![High boots.png](/images/9/92/High_boots.png)](/wiki/File:High_boots.png) |                                                                                                                 |
| -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| 外观                                                                                     | 长筒靴                                                                                                             |
|                                                                                        |                                                                                                                 |
| 装备槽位                                                                                   | [靴子](/wiki/%E9%9D%B4%E5%AD%90 "靴子")                                                                             |
| AC                                                                                     | [2](/index.php?title=%E6%8A%A4%E7%94%B2%E7%AD%89%E7%BA%A7\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "护甲等级 (page does not exist)") |
| 特殊效果                                                                                   | *（无）*                                                                                                           |
|                                                                                        |                                                                                                                 |
| 基础价                                                                                    | 12 [zm](/wiki/%E9%87%91%E5%B8%81 "金币")                                                                          |
| 重量                                                                                     | [20](/index.php?title=%E9%87%8D%E9%87%8F\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "重量 (page does not exist)")                    |
| 材料                                                                                     | [皮革](/index.php?title=%E7%9A%AE%E9%9D%A9\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "皮革 (page does not exist)")                    |

**高筒靴**（high boots）是[NetHack](/index.php?title=NetHack/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "NetHack/zh-CN (page does not exist)")中的一种[靴子](/wiki/%E9%9D%B4%E5%AD%90 "靴子")类[防具](/wiki/%E9%98%B2%E5%85%B7 "防具")。它由[皮革](/index.php?title=%E7%9A%AE%E9%9D%A9\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "皮革 (page does not exist)")制成，未[鉴定](/index.php?title=%E9%89%B4%E5%AE%9A\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "鉴定 (page does not exist)")时外观为**长筒靴**（jackboots）。

[ ]

## Contents

- [1 生成](#.E7.94.9F.E6.88.90)

- [2 描述](#.E6.8F.8F.E8.BF.B0)

- [3 策略](#.E7.AD.96.E7.95.A5)

- [4 历史](#.E5.8E.86.E5.8F.B2)

- [5 Variants](#Variants)

  - [5.1 SLASH'EM](#SLASH.27EM)
  - [5.2 dNetHack](#dNetHack)
  - [5.3 notdNetHack](#notdNetHack)
  - [5.4 SpliceHack](#SpliceHack)
  - [5.5 EvilHack](#EvilHack)
  - [5.6 SlashTHEM](#SlashTHEM)

- [6 百科文本](#.E7.99.BE.E7.A7.91.E6.96.87.E6.9C.AC)

- [7 引用及注释](#.E5.BC.95.E7.94.A8.E5.8F.8A.E6.B3.A8.E9.87.8A)

## 生成

[雇佣兵](/index.php?title=%E9%9B%87%E4%BD%A3%E5%85%B5\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "雇佣兵 (page does not exist)")类怪物生成时有1⁄6的概率[携带](/index.php?title=%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%E8%B5%B7%E5%A7%8B%E7%89%A9%E5%93%81\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "怪物起始物品 (page does not exist)")一双高筒靴[\[1\]](#cite_note-1)。[酋长](/index.php?title=%E9%85%8B%E9%95%BF\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "酋长 (page does not exist)")、[实习骑士](/index.php?title=%E5%AE%9E%E4%B9%A0%E9%AA%91%E5%A3%AB\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "实习骑士 (page does not exist)")、[禅师](/index.php?title=%E7%A6%85%E5%B8%88\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "禅师 (page does not exist)")和[战士](/index.php?title=%E6%88%98%E5%A3%AB\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "战士 (page does not exist)")在生成时有1⁄4的概率获得一双高筒靴[\[2\]](#cite_note-2)。

在[星界位面](/index.php?title=%E6%98%9F%E7%95%8C%E4%BD%8D%E9%9D%A2\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "星界位面 (page does not exist)")生成的[玩家怪物](/index.php?title=%E7%8E%A9%E5%AE%B6%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "玩家怪物 (page does not exist)")有约10.02%的概率携带一双高筒靴[\[3\]](#cite_note-3)[\[4\]](#cite_note-mk_mplayer_armor-4)。

## 描述

高筒靴的基础[AC](/index.php?title=AC/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "AC/zh-CN (page does not exist)")加成为2，穿戴时有4⁄5的概率防止穿戴者的腿被[玄蚊](/index.php?title=%E7%8E%84%E8%9A%8A\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "玄蚊 (page does not exist)")叮[伤](/index.php?title=%E8%85%BF%E4%BC%A4\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "腿伤 (page does not exist)")[\[5\]](#cite_note-5)。

## 策略

高筒靴是唯一一种基础AC为2，且不会阻碍[施法](/index.php?title=%E6%96%BD%E6%B3%95\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "施法 (page does not exist)")的靴子，玩家可以一直穿着它直到找到合适的[魔法靴子](/index.php?title=%E9%AD%94%E6%B3%95%E7%89%A9%E5%93%81\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "魔法物品 (page does not exist)")为止。[精灵靴](/wiki/%E7%B2%BE%E7%81%B5%E9%9D%B4 "精灵靴")可以安全附魔到+7，其最高AC比起+5高筒靴要高1点。[速度靴](/wiki/%E9%80%9F%E5%BA%A6%E9%9D%B4 "速度靴")和[跳跃靴](/wiki/%E8%B7%B3%E8%B7%83%E9%9D%B4 "跳跃靴")作为[飞升套件](/index.php?title=%E9%A3%9E%E5%8D%87%E5%A5%97%E4%BB%B6\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "飞升套件 (page does not exist)")的重要组件也常用来取代高筒靴，你可以[批量变形](/index.php?title=%E6%89%B9%E9%87%8F%E5%8F%98%E5%BD%A2\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "批量变形 (page does not exist)")附魔的精灵靴来获取它们。

## 历史

高筒靴最初于[NetHack 3.0.0](/wiki/NetHack_3.0.0 "NetHack 3.0.0")加入游戏。

## Variants

**此条目或段落的部分内容需要翻译。**  
您可以帮助我们[**翻译此页面**](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=High_boots/zh-CN\&action=edit)，但**请勿使用机器翻译**。

### SLASH'EM

In [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM"), [Yeomen](/wiki/Yeomen "Yeomen") always start the game with a pair of high boots.

### dNetHack

In [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack"), [Pirates](/wiki/Pirate "Pirate") start with a pair of +0 high boots, and [dwarf](/wiki/Dwarf_\(starting_race\) "Dwarf (starting race)") [Binders](/wiki/Binder_\(dNetHack_role\) "Binder (dNetHack role)") start with a +0 pair of burnt high boots.

[Xorn monks](/wiki/Xorn_monk "Xorn monk") have a 3⁄16 chance of being generated with high boots. [Mayor Cummerbund](/wiki/Mayor_Cummerbund "Mayor Cummerbund"), the [Pirate quest](/wiki/Pirate_quest "Pirate quest") leader, and the [quest guardian](/wiki/Quest_guardian "Quest guardian") [pirate brothers](/wiki/Pirate_brother "Pirate brother") are generated with high boots. [Wandering skeletal and gityanki pirates](/wiki/Wandering_pirate "Wandering pirate") are generated with high boots. The [Rebel Ringleader](/wiki/Rebel_Ringleader "Rebel Ringleader") that serves as the [Noble](/wiki/Noble "Noble")'s [quest nemesis](/wiki/Quest_nemesis "Quest nemesis") for the default \[\[Noble quest] is always generated with high boots.

### notdNetHack

In [notdNetHack](/wiki/NotdNetHack "NotdNetHack") and [notnotdNetHack](/wiki/NotnotdNetHack "NotnotdNetHack"), in addition to dNetHack details, [Dantalion](/wiki/Dantalion "Dantalion") generates with a pair of high boots when he is summoned by an [Illithanachronounbinder](/wiki/Illithanachronounbinder "Illithanachronounbinder").

### SpliceHack

In [SpliceHack](/wiki/SpliceHack "SpliceHack"), high boots can be combined with a [ring of levitation](/wiki/Ring_of_levitation "Ring of levitation") at a [furnace](/wiki/Furnace "Furnace") to create [levitation boots](/wiki/Levitation_boots "Levitation boots").

### EvilHack

In [EvilHack](/wiki/EvilHack "EvilHack"), [giant](/wiki/Giant_\(starting_race\) "Giant (starting race)") [Monks](/wiki/Monk "Monk") and [Priests](/wiki/Priest "Priest") start with a pair of +1 high boots in place of the role's starting [robe](/wiki/Robe "Robe").

[Cultists](/wiki/Cultist "Cultist"), the [Infidel quest](/wiki/Infidel_quest "Infidel quest") guardians, have a 2⁄9 chance of generating with high boots. [The Paladin](/wiki/Paladin_\(monster\) "Paladin (monster)"), the [Infidel](/wiki/Infidel "Infidel") quest nemesis, is also generated with high boots.

### SlashTHEM

[SlashTHEM](/wiki/SlashTHEM "SlashTHEM") retains SLASH'EM details and adds the Pirate and Noble roles, including the monsters that generate with high boots.

## 百科文本

In Fantasyland these are remarkable in that they seldom or  
never wear out and are suitable for riding or walking in  
without the need of Socks. Boots never pinch, rub, or get  
stones in them; nor do nails stick upwards into the feet from  
the soles. They are customarily mid-calf length or knee-high,  
slip on and off easily and never smell of feet. Unfortunately,  
the formula for making this splendid footwear is a closely  
guarded secret, possibly derived from nonhumans (see Dwarfs,  
Elves, and Gnomes).  
\[ The Tough Guide to Fantasyland, by Diana Wynne Jones ]

## 引用及注释

1. [↑](#cite_ref-1) [src/makemon.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 644](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/makemon.c#L644)
2. [↑](#cite_ref-2) [src/makemon.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 294](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/makemon.c#L294)
3. [↑](#cite_ref-3) [src/mplayer.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 134](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/mplayer.c#L134)
4. [↑](#cite_ref-mk_mplayer_armor_4-0) [src/mplayer.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 294](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/mplayer.c#L294)
5. [↑](#cite_ref-5) [src/mhitu.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 1218](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/mhitu.c#L1218)

[![此条目的内容已同步至NetHack 3.6.7。详细信息请点击此处。](/images/f/f7/Nh367-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "此条目的内容已同步至NetHack 3.6.7。详细信息请点击此处。")
html:
High boots/zh-CN

From NetHackWiki
< High boots
Jump to navigation Jump to search

NetHack 中文 Wiki 需要您的帮助！
了解如何帮助我们完善Wiki

English

 • 中文（中国大陆）‎
[   高筒靴  
外观 长筒靴
装备槽位 靴子
AC 2
特殊效果

（无）

基础价 12 zm
重量 20
材料 皮革

高筒靴（high boots）是NetHack中的一种靴子类防具。它由皮革制成，未鉴定时外观为长筒靴（jackboots）。

Contents

  • 1 生成
  • 2 描述
  • 3 策略
  • 4 历史
  • 5 Variants
    • 5.1 SLASH'EM
    • 5.2 dNetHack
    • 5.3 notdNetHack
    • 5.4 SpliceHack
    • 5.5 EvilHack
    • 5.6 SlashTHEM
  • 6 百科文本
  • 7 引用及注释

生成

雇佣兵类怪物生成时有1⁄6的概率携带一双高筒靴[1]。酋长、实习骑士、禅师和战士在生成时有1⁄4的概率获得一双高筒靴[2]。

在星界位面生成的玩家怪物有约10.02%的概率携带一双高筒靴[3][4]。

描述

高筒靴的基础AC加成为2，穿戴时有4⁄5的概率防止穿戴者的腿被玄蚊叮伤[5]。

策略

高筒靴是唯一一种基础AC为2，且不会阻碍施法的靴子，玩家可以一直穿着它直到找到合适的魔法靴子为止。精灵靴可以安全附魔到+7，其最高AC比起+5高筒靴要高1点。速度靴和跳跃靴作为飞升套件的重要组件也常用来取代高筒靴，你可以批量变形附魔的精灵靴来获取它们。

历史

高筒靴最初于NetHack 3.0.0加入游戏。

Variants

此条目或段落的部分内容需要翻译。
您可以帮助我们翻译此页面，但请勿使用机器翻译。

SLASH'EM

In SLASH'EM, Yeomen always start the game with a pair of high boots.

dNetHack

In dNetHack, Pirates start with a pair of +0 high boots, and dwarf Binders start with a +0 pair of burnt high boots.

Xorn monks have a 3⁄16 chance of being generated with high boots. Mayor Cummerbund, the Pirate quest leader, and the quest guardian pirate brothers are generated with high boots. Wandering skeletal and gityanki pirates are generated with high boots. The Rebel Ringleader that serves as the Noble's quest nemesis for the default [[Noble quest] is always generated with high boots.

notdNetHack

In notdNetHack and notnotdNetHack, in addition to dNetHack details, Dantalion generates with a pair of high boots when he is summoned by an Illithanachronounbinder.

SpliceHack

In SpliceHack, high boots can be combined with a ring of levitation at a furnace to create levitation boots.

EvilHack

In EvilHack, giant Monks and Priests start with a pair of +1 high boots in place of the role's starting robe.

Cultists, the Infidel quest guardians, have a 2⁄9 chance of generating with high boots. The Paladin, the Infidel quest nemesis, is also generated with high boots.

SlashTHEM

SlashTHEM retains SLASH'EM details and adds the Pirate and Noble roles, including the monsters that generate with high boots.

百科文本

In Fantasyland these are remarkable in that they seldom or
never wear out and are suitable for riding or walking in
without the need of Socks. Boots never pinch, rub, or get
stones in them; nor do nails stick upwards into the feet from
the soles. They are customarily mid-calf length or knee-high,
slip on and off easily and never smell of feet. Unfortunately,
the formula for making this splendid footwear is a closely
guarded secret, possibly derived from nonhumans (see Dwarfs,
Elves, and Gnomes).
[ The Tough Guide to Fantasyland, by Diana Wynne Jones ]

引用及注释

  1. ↑ src/makemon.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 644
  2. ↑ src/makemon.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 294
  3. ↑ src/mplayer.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 134
  4. ↑ src/mplayer.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 294
  5. ↑ src/mhitu.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 1218

'''高筒靴'''（high boots）是{{cnlink|NetHack}}中的一种[[靴子]]类[[防具]]。它由[[皮革]]制成，未[[鉴定]]时外观为'''长筒靴'''（jackboots）。

== 生成 ==
[[雇佣兵]]类怪物生成时有{{frac|6}}的概率[[怪物起始物品|携带]]一双高筒靴{{refsrc|src/makemon.c|644|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}。[[酋长]]、[[实习骑士]]、[[禅师]]和[[战士]]在生成时有{{frac|4}}的概率获得一双高筒靴{{refsrc|src/makemon.c|294|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}。

在[[星界位面]]生成的[[玩家怪物]]有约10.02%的概率携带一双高筒靴{{refsrc|src/mplayer.c|134|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}{{refsrc|src/mplayer.c|294|version=NetHack 3.6.7|name=mk_mplayer_armor}}。

== 描述 ==
高筒靴的基础{{cnlink|AC}}加成为2，穿戴时有{{frac|4|5}}的概率防止穿戴者的腿被[[玄蚊]]叮[[腿伤|伤]]{{refsrc|src/mhitu.c|1218|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}。

== 策略 ==
高筒靴是唯一一种基础AC为2，且不会阻碍[[施法]]的靴子，玩家可以一直穿着它直到找到合适的[[魔法物品|魔法靴子]]为止。[[精灵靴]]可以安全附魔到+7，其最高AC比起+5高筒靴要高1点。[[速度靴]]和[[跳跃靴]]作为[[飞升套件]]的重要组件也常用来取代高筒靴，你可以[[批量变形]]附魔的精灵靴来获取它们。

== 历史 ==
高筒靴最初于[[NetHack 3.0.0]]加入游戏。

==Variants==
{{translation/zh-CN|n}}
===SLASH'EM===
In [[SLASH'EM]], [[Yeomen]] always start the game with a pair of high boots.

===dNetHack===
In [[dNetHack]], [[Pirate]]s start with a pair of +0 high boots, and [[Dwarf (starting race)|dwarf]] [[Binder (dNetHack role)|Binders]] start with a +0 pair of burnt high boots.

[[Xorn monk]]s have a {{frac|3|16}} chance of being generated with high boots. [[Mayor Cummerbund]], the [[Pirate quest]] leader, and the [[quest guardian]] [[pirate brother]]s are generated with high boots. [[Wandering pirate|Wandering skeletal and gityanki pirates]] are generated with high boots. The [[Rebel Ringleader]] that serves as the [[Noble]]'s [[quest nemesis]] for the default [[Noble quest] is always generated with high boots.

===notdNetHack===
In [[notdNetHack]] and [[notnotdNetHack]], in addition to dNetHack details, [[Dantalion]] generates with a pair of high boots when he is summoned by an [[Illithanachronounbinder]].

===SpliceHack===
In [[SpliceHack]], high boots can be combined with a [[ring of levitation]] at a [[furnace]] to create [[levitation boots]].

===EvilHack===
In [[EvilHack]], [[Giant (starting race)|giant]] [[Monk]]s and [[Priest]]s start with a pair of +1 high boots in place of the role's starting [[robe]].

[[Cultist]]s, the [[Infidel quest]] guardians, have a {{frac|2|9}} chance of generating with high boots. [[Paladin (monster)|The Paladin]], the [[Infidel]] quest nemesis, is also generated with high boots.

===SlashTHEM===
[[SlashTHEM]] retains SLASH'EM details and adds the Pirate and Noble roles, including the monsters that generate with high boots.

== 百科文本 ==
{{encyclopedia|
In Fantasyland these are remarkable in that they seldom or
never wear out and are suitable for riding or walking in
without the need of Socks.  Boots never pinch, rub, or get
stones in them; nor do nails stick upwards into the feet from
the soles.  They are customarily mid-calf length or knee-high,
slip on and off easily and never smell of feet.  Unfortunately,
the formula for making this splendid footwear is a closely
guarded secret, possibly derived from nonhumans (see Dwarfs,
Elves, and Gnomes).
[ The Tough Guide to Fantasyland, by Diana Wynne Jones ]
}}

== 引用及注释 ==
<references/>
{{nethack-367/zh-CN}}
[[Category:Boots/zh-CN|GAOTONGXUE]]
